name: G.G Series SCORE ATTACKER
synopsis: Control your fighter craft through space to destroy enemy ships in this top down action shooter! Avoid shots from enemies while collecting E boxes that the enemies drop to charge your "α" Cannon which fires an extremely powerful sphere of energy and "β" Blast which absorbs any enemy projectiles nearby. At the end of each stage a barrage of powerful enemies will try to stop you. Depending on how high your score is in each stage, the level of difficulty will increase. Propel yourself forward as the Score Attacker!
